name: Troot
description:
Troot Root. Expand. Conquer. Rules:
  1. Start with tree node.
  2. Expand the root node next to existing roots. 
  3. Take turns expanding and attacking opponent's roots.
  4. If your roots touch opponent's roots then neighboring and disconnected roots of the opponent decay.
  5. You win when other player has no possible moves left.
